name: NSDiffableDataSourceSnapshot
desc: A representation of the state of the data in a view at a specific point in time.

items.desc: Creates an empty snapshot.

items.desc: Adds the sections with the specified identifiers to the snapshot.

items.desc: The number of items in the snapshot.

items.name: func moveSection(SectionIdentifierType, beforeSection: SectionIdentifierType)

items.name: func reloadItems([ItemIdentifierType])
